the photocatalytic reaction begins, collect 2 mL of the suspensions in a time interval of 20 min, centrifuge the obtained samples and dilute the obtained supernatants twice.The final liquid was used for the measurements of fluorescence spectroscopy.The photoreactions were conducted without purging oxygen into the suspension.The generated signals of 2-hydroxy terephthalic acid were measured by a fluorescence spectrophotometer with an excitation light wavelength of 320 nm.
